title: Maliceprime
author: Maliceprime
content: Before you decide to go away from crypto space simply because we are in a bear market I want you to know that some amazing stuffs was built in the last bear market, our so called Ethereum killers 1. Hedera  2. Solana. 3. Algorand.  4. Avalanche. These projects came in the bear market, if you walk away now till next btc halving you will be missing a lot of future opportunities.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: I'll take a guess that those are also part of your portfolio.Quote from: Maliceprime on May 31, 2022, 01:07:37 PMThese projects came in the bear market, if you walk away now till next btc halving you will be missing a lot of future opportunities.It's noticeable that those projects are good and based on how the rankings they are, there's an active development from the devs. But knowing that things can change in an instant just like the examples of other projects like Luna and UST. Just be researchful before you invest in a project. And if someone decides to go away and let his portfolio sleep until the next bitcoin halving, that's his decision and strategy.

These projects came in the bear market, if you walk away now till next btc halving you will be missing a lot of future opportunities.That does not mean, seeing how a coin is decreasing in value and someone's money worth is decreasing can be very depressing. Assuming you bought the ethereum killer altcoin when the price was very high, like Solana at $250 with $2500 and the price now at $45, that means your money worth has reduced to $450, which is $2050 money loss. What still tell us that the bear market will not last than this and that the price of the coins will not sink down further. What I am thinking to be the best approach is to just wait until another massive fall that people will be so affraid to invest, that will be the best time to invest. And we should always know that holding altcoins is like we are gambling but a very significant bear market will trigger bull run.

comments.body: They came as an ETH killer and look at them right now?Though I like the idea of staying on this market even on a bear market, I just don't like those coins well you can really have it as long as you analyze it properly but if you are a newbie, better to look for a more good project especially on this market. This is a great opportunity to buy many good projects while they are still cheap, the next Bitcoin halving will surely bring a positive impact on this market, many are slowly preparing for this and we should also do that as a small investor.
